subject: Defective Smartwatch – Assistance Needed (Order #ORD-654321)
body:
Hello,

I recently purchased a smartwatch (Order #ORD-654321) and received it on February 10th. Unfortunately, the screen is unresponsive, and the device won’t charge properly.

I have already tried the following troubleshooting steps:
- Restarting the watch
- Using a different charging cable and adapter
- Performing a factory reset

None of these steps resolved the issue. I’d appreciate your guidance on how to proceed. Please let me know if you need any further details.

Thanks,
Michael Smith
